results.title: Devotion
results.creator_credit: Mindy Kaplan, Arlene Battishill, Dancing Arrow Productions and Northern Arts
results.brief_description: Lesbian and stand-up comic Sheila Caston is about to get her big break - her own TV show. But when it turns out her (unrequited) first love is a central player in the deal, Shelia is thrown into a struggle between past and present; between her unresolved love for TV producer Lynn, and for her partner of five years, Julie. In this emotional maelstrom, personal and professional lives slip into confusion and chaos, throwing Shelia’s career into jeopardy. A love triangle with a 90s twist this film runs the gamut of laughter and tears, joy and sorrow, hope and desperation.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Mindy Kaplan, Arlene Battishill, Dancing Arrow Productions and Northern Arts

results.title: Confidence in contact
results.creator_credit: Bill Latto and Town and Country Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Better Rugby”.
New methods of introducing and developing the techniques of tackling in rugby football. After building surprising ability and confidence in junior players, Barry John (Wales and British Lions) and Willie John McBride (Ireland and British Lions) show how the same coaching methods can be used in giving senior players complete confidence in going in for the tackle.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bill Latto and Town and Country Productions

results.title: Development of feelings in children
results.creator_credit: Donald Connors and Parents' Magazine Films
results.brief_description: Describes and illustrates how the child develops feelings, stressing that the child must be allowed to express his/her feelings freely, particularly feelings of fear, anger and hate. Aims to make parents aware of the distinction between feelings and actions, and suggests ways that parents can aid the healthy emotional development of their child.

results.title: Developing more and better ideas
results.brief_description: A down-to-earth presentation of the process of developing ideas to help everyone, from top management to lowest rate employee, produce more and better ideas for cutting costs, increasing productivity, developing products and improving quality and performance.

results.title: Destruction Derby
results.brief_description: In this animated fable with no narration, a caveman builds a car and soon the whole planet is overrun with cars, trucks and airplanes and the air choked with polluting fumes. The imaginative cartoon focuses on one aspect of destruction to the environment and offers a tongue-in-cheek solution - send all cars off in a rocket, into outer space.

results.title: Deskside manner
results.creator_credit: Hugh Munro, Organisation and Methods Training Council and S.B. Modules
results.brief_description: An abbrassive efficiency expert interviews a worker about his job. A humorous look at office efficiency, emphasising the need to follow logical steps and avoid duplicating work.
